ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Charm
ygData.msgSnippet: I think it would be enjoyable to have a pet Vox wipe out all the Ice Giants for you... :) ... From:  To:  Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
I think it would be enjoyable to have a pet Vox wipe out all the Ice Giants
for you... :)

----- Original Message -----
From: <kim@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, April 13, 2000 12:03 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Charm


> On Thu, 13 Apr 2000, Kimes, Dean W. wrote:
>
> > I hope someone will always care if 4 bards can charm 4 giants into
beating
> > on Lady Vox as described.
>
> The thing is, if Vox's level isn't upgraded with Kunark, then
> she's going to be no more special than, say, the Solusek
> priest is now.
>
> --
> John H. Kim
